user.title: Connect to Meet Circle
user.description: Enter your Circle account credentials and device ID.

data_description.device_id: The device ID from your Circle app. You can find this in the Charles Proxy logs or use the one from your iOS app.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate with Meet Circle
reauth_confirm.description: Your Circle session has expired. Please re-enter your password.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Circle servers.

abort.already_configured: This Circle account is already configured.
